org.ros.internal.node.client
Class MasterClient

java.lang.Object
  org.ros.internal.node.client.MasterClient

public class MasterClient
extends java.lang.Object

Provides access to the XML-RPC API exposed by a MasterServer.

Author:
damonkohler@google.com (Damon Kohler)

registerService

Registers the given ServiceServer.

Parameters:
slave - the SlaveIdentifier where the ServiceServer is running
service - the ServiceServer to register
Returns:
a Response with a void result

unregisterService

                                                     ServiceServer<?,?> service)
Unregisters the specified ServiceServer.

Parameters:
slave - the SlaveIdentifier where the ServiceServer is running
service - the ServiceServer to unregister
Returns:
a Response with the number of unregistered services as the result

registerSubscriber

public Response<java.util.List<java.net.URI>> registerSubscriber(SlaveIdentifier slave,
                                                                 Subscriber<?> subscriber)
Registers the given Subscriber. In addition to receiving a list of current Publishers, the Subscribers SlaveServer will also receive notifications of new Publishers via the publisherUpdate API.

Parameters:
slave - the SlaveIdentifier that the Subscriber is running on
subscriber - the Subscriber to register
Returns:
a Response with a List or SlaveServer XML-RPC API URIs for nodes currently publishing the specified topic as the result

unregisterSubscriber

public Response<java.lang.Integer> unregisterSubscriber(SlaveIdentifier slave,
                                                        Subscriber<?> subscriber)
Unregisters the specified Subscriber.

Parameters:
slave - the SlaveIdentifier where the subscriber is running
subscriber - the Subscriber to unregister
Returns:
a Response with the number of unregistered subscribers as the result

registerPublisher

public Response<java.util.List<java.net.URI>> registerPublisher(PublisherDefinition publisher)
Registers the specified PublisherDefinition.

Parameters:
publisher - the PublisherDefinition of the Publisher to register
Returns:
a Response with a List of the current SlaveServer URIs which have Subscribers for the published Topic.

unregisterPublisher

public Response<java.lang.Integer> unregisterPublisher(SlaveIdentifier slave,
                                                       Publisher<?> publisher)
Unregisters the specified PublisherDefinition.

Parameters:
publisher - the PublisherDefinition of the Publisher to unregister
Returns:
a Response with the number of unregistered Publishers as the result
